modules.name: forgekeeper.config
modules.docstring: Configuration helpers for the unified runtime.

modules.name: forgekeeper.inference_backends.harmony
modules.docstring: Utilities for rendering prompts that follow the Harmony protocol.

classes.name: HarmonyConfig
classes.docstring:
Configuration for rendering Harmony prompts.

Attributes:
    include_default_system: Whether to prepend the recommended default
        system message if one is not already supplied.
    knowledge_cutoff: The knowledge cutoff date to report in the system
        message.
    current_date: The current date that should be surfaced to the model.
    reasoning_effort: Desired reasoning effort to request from the model.
    valid_channels: Ordered iterable of channels the assistant may use.
    tool_channel_note: Optional note reminding the model that tool calls
        must target the ``commentary`` channel.
    append_assistant_start: Whether to append ``<|start|>assistant`` to the
        rendered prompt so that the model knows to begin responding.

functions.name: render_harmony
functions.docstring: Render a sequence of conversation messages in Harmony format.

classes.name: HarmonyResponse
classes.docstring: Represents a single Harmony response from the llmcore server.

classes.name: _HarmonyAccumulator
classes.docstring: Collects streamed Harmony events into a structured response.

functions.name: handle_mcp_request
functions.docstring: Stub for future Model Context Protocol request handling.

classes.name: ToolDefinition
classes.docstring: Represents a tool exposed to the model via Harmony developer messages.

classes.name: HarmonyToolCall
classes.docstring: Structured representation of a Harmony tool call.

functions.name: _schema_to_typescript
functions.docstring: Convert a JSON schema mapping into a TypeScript type expression.

functions.name: render_tool_developer_message
functions.docstring: Build the developer message that advertises tool availability.

functions.name: _extract_name
functions.docstring: Derive namespace and tool name from a raw Harmony tool call payload.

functions.name: parse_tool_calls
functions.docstring: Convert raw Harmony tool call payloads into :class:`HarmonyToolCall` objects.

functions.name: build_assistant_tool_call
functions.docstring: Render a Harmony-formatted assistant tool call message.

functions.name: build_tool_result_message
functions.docstring: Render a Harmony-formatted tool response message back to the assistant.
